## Paper Details

- **Title:** [Title of the paper]
- **Link:** [Link to the paper (ArXiv/PDF)]
- **Category:** [e.g., Architectures, Reasoning, Training, etc.]
- **One-Sentence Description:** [A concise, one-sentence description of why this paper matters.]

## Checklist

- [ ] I have checked that this paper is not already in the list.
- [ ] I have provided a one-sentence description.
- [ ] The description does not start with "A" or "An" and ends with a period.
- [ ] I have linked directly to the paper/repo.
